body: You have worked for a crime lord, either as a low-level enforcer or as a guard, and are adept at frightening away people. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Intimidate checks, and Intimidate is always a class skill for you.
name: Brute
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Brute
